creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones
description: night view of bridge with three arches; two red lights on bridge- one reflected in water; figures on bridge and in LLC; white lights on shore at center of image
inscription:
Signature, title, edition, inscription and stamp
LLC, in the image: illegible inscription- probably signature
markings: LLC, in blue pencil: [14/50]; LLC, stamped in purple: [CH (intertwined)]
signed: LRC, in blue pencil: [Eugène Delâtre]; at bottom edge of sheet, in pencil: [No 27  le pont  Solferino  S. fay (?)]
title: Le pont Solferino
